#Scrape the Name of the Product
```{r}
keyboadName1_url1 <- read_html(url1)
  
keyboadName1 <- keyboadName1_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-size-medium.a-color-base.a-text-normal") %>%
  html_text()
keyboadName1

```
#Scrape the Price
```{r}
keyboadPrice1 <- keyboadPrice1_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("") %>%
  html_text()

keyboadPrice1

```
